text: Mujye munaguma mu ngo zanyu kandi ntimukagaragaze imitako yanyu nk’uko (abagore bo mu bihe) by’ubujiji babikoraga. Mujye muhozaho amasengesho, mutange amaturo kandi mwumvire Allah n’Intumwa ye. Mu by’ukuri, yemwe bantu bo mu rugo (rw’Intumwa)! Allah arashaka kubakuriraho (ibibi n’ibyaha) ndetse (arashaka) kubasukura byimazeyo
